Description.Text: Relax in the sky lobby, located on the 16th floor or soak up the sunshine on the 17th floor outdoor pool terrace. Enjoy incredible views of the city and beyond from the 17th floor modern fitness center. Keep on top of work during your stay at the 24-hour business center. Start your day right with Hampton's free hot breakfast. Don't miss out if you're in a rush , just grab one of our free Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Unwind in your contemporary guest room with thoughtful amenities. Keep in touch with free high-speed internet access, relax watching the 32-inch HDTV, or get to work at the desk. At the end of a busy day refresh with a great night's sleep in the clean and fresh Hampton bed .

Located between the Caribbean Sea and Cartagena Bay, in the vibrant commercial and tourist district of Bocagrande, Hampton by Hilton Cartagena offers easy access to all the attractions and entertainment options the city has to offer. Relax on the beach, just a block from the hotel, or take a five-minute taxi ride to the historic city center with its array of bars, restaurants, and nightclubs. Explore the enchanting streets of the walled city to admire colonial architecture, charming squares, and churches. Our hotel in Cartagena, Colombia is just 15 minutes from the airport and 25 minutes from the industrial/port area. Cartagena Convention Center is only five kilometers away.
135 comfortable guest rooms and accessible rooms

Start your day right with a free hot breakfast at this Hampton hotel. Help yourself to a choice of delicious hot and cold breakfast items before heading off for business, a day of exploring, or just relaxation. Wake up with coffee, tea or fruit juice and enjoy a place to read the morning newspaper. Recharge at any time of the day in the hotel lobby with the perfect cup of free tea or coffee.
